Literature.Title: In Silico and In Vitro Analyses Reveal Promising Antimicrobial Peptides from Myxobacteria.
Literature.Author: Arakal BS, Whitworth DE, James PE, Rowlands R, Madhusoodanan NPT, Baijoo MR, Livingstone PG

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>500µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>500µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 13883(MIC=>500µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 25923(MIC=>500µg/ml),Bacillus subtilis(MIC=>500µg/ml)
